properties.query:
let ASimFields = externaldata (ColumnName: string, ColumnType: string, Class: string, Schema: string)
  [@"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/master/ASIM/dev/ASimSchemaTester/ASimSchemaTester.csv"] with (format="csv", IgnoreFirstRecord=true)
  | where Schema =~ selected_schema;
  T 
  | join kind=fullouter ASimFields on ColumnName
  | extend Result = case(
      ColumnName == "" and Class == "Mandatory",  strcat ("(0) Error: Missing mandatory field [", ColumnName1, "]"),
      ColumnName == "" and Class == "Recommended", strcat ("(1) Warning: Missing recommended field [", ColumnName1, "]"),
      ColumnName == "" and Class == "Alias", strcat ("(1) Warning: Missing alias [", ColumnName1, "]"),
      ColumnName == "" and Class == "Optional", strcat ("(2) Info: Missing optional field [", ColumnName1, "]"),
      ColumnName1 == "", strcat ("(2) Info: extra unnormalized column [", ColumnName, "]"),
      ColumnType != ColumnType1, strcat ("(0) Error: type mismatch for column [", ColumnName, "]. It is currently ", ColumnType, " and should be ", ColumnType1),
      'None'
    )
  | where Result != "None" | sort by Result asc | project Result
